projects: [{"title":"Markowitz Portfolio Management","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"Construct a Markowitz Portfolio with NIFTY 50 to analyze risk & return for a portfolio of 15 stocksObtained the price data of NIFTY 50 for the last 5 years and plotted the daily stock price of each companyTraded the portfolio by holding it over a testing period of 6 months and analyzed total return, volatility, Beta, Sharpe Ratio, Jensen’s Alphaand compared these metrics wrt the benchmark i.e. NIFTY 50Obtained optimal weights for maximum Sharpe Ratio and minimum variance and plotted the efficient frontierAchieved a correlation score of 74% with NIFTY 50 and reported the results for a portfolio of 15 stocks"},{"title":"Financial Analysis of Stocks","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Created a Discounted Cash Flow Model for stocks Reliance Industries Limited and Adani Ports & SEZ Limited and predicted their valuation for the next three years using fundamental analysisSet up the Excel-based model for the price movement of stocks over the past 5 years and predicted the valuation for coming yearsPrepared an equity research report for the stocks summarising the Management Discussion Analysis and concluded the buy/sell call for each stock after three years"},{"title":"Automated Vertical Car Parking System","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Sep 2019","description":"Designed and developed a mechanical system to minimize the are and volume required for parking carsImplemented various machining processes such as lathing, milling, drilling and fitting to build the systemWorked as a key member of the team towards execution of 2D design to a working 3D modelEstimated the total cost of project by allocating value to each process, labour, raw material used in the project"}]
